results.content:
Before now, I was fairly familiar with domain name registration and website hosting process. but this course has made  it clearer, exposing to me better ways to go about it and for my privacy and the security of my website. 
Also, I now understand the concept of cloud hosting and how it differs from the regular traditional hosting service. 
i am very grateful for this course because I am working on my startup e-commerce website. Now i know how to go about what I really want (A cloud hosting).
Once again, a big thanks to the instructor and to Udemy. God Bless
kind Regards 
Favour Onemu
